AttentionHeadComposition#

class core_arrakis.attention_head_comp.AttentionComposer(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Class to interpret attention heads.

apply_composed_head(input_ids, Q, K, V, O)#

Applies the composed head to the input.

attention_path_patching(input_ids, src_head, dest_head)#

Patches the attention path from a source head to a destination head.

head_composition(head1, head2, alpha=0.5)#

Composes two heads.

AttentionTools#

class core_arrakis.attention_tools.AttentionTools(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Understanding attention patterns by analyzing, visualizing and manipulating it.

ablate_head(layer_idx, head_idx)#

Ablate a specific head in a specific layer of a model.

attention_patterns(input_ids, layer_idx, head_idx)#

Extract the attention patterns of a specific head in a specific layer of a model.

merge_heads(layer_idx, head_idx1, head_idx2, alpha=0.5)#

Merge two heads in a specific layer of a model. This is really helpful in understanding redundancy in attention heads.

top_attended_ids(input_ids, layer_idx, head_idx, num_tokens=2)#

Extract the top-k attended ids of a specific head in a specific layer of a model.

CausalTracingIntervention#

class core_arrakis.causal_tracing_intervention.CausalTracer(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

locating and Editing Factored Cognition.

intervene_on_neuron(input_ids, layer_idx, neuron_idx, scale=0)#

Intervenes on a neuron in the model.

trace_token_probability(input_ids, target_idx)#

Traces the probability of the target token through the layers.

KnowledgeGraphExtractor#

class core_arrakis.kg_extractor.KnowledgeGraphExtractor(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Extracting relational subspaces from Q-K interaction,Projecting token embeddings onto these subspaces, Indentifying types of relations

extract_relational_subspaces(layer_idx, top_k=3)#

Extracts the top-k relational subspaces from the Q-K interaction matrix of the layer.

identify_relation_types(token_ids, subspaces, threshold=0.3)#

Identifies the types of relations based on the projected embeddings.

project_token_embeddings(token_ids, subspaces)#

Projects the token embeddings onto the given subspaces.

KnowledgeProber#

class core_arrakis.knowledge_prober.KnowledgeProber(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Probes the model for knowledge.

knowledge_probe(ids, concept_neuron)#

Probes the model for knowledge.

polysemantic_score(layer_idx, k_neighbors=5)#

Computes the polysemantic score of the neurons in the layer.

LogitAttribution#

class core_arrakis.logit_attribution.LogitAttributor(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Attribution of the logit to the input tokens.

logit_attribution(input_ids, target_idx)#

Computes the attribution of the target logit to the input tokens. Returns the attributions.

track_token_circulation(input_ids, target_idx, n_layers=2)#

Tracks the token circulation through the layers. Returns the direct moves and the total moves.

LogitLens#

class core_arrakis.logit_lens.LogitLens(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Analyzes the logit lens of the model.

layer_attributions(input_ids, target_idx)#

Computes the attributions of the layers.

logit_lens(input_ids, target_idx, layer_idx)#

Computes the logit lens of the model.

ModelSurgery#

class core_arrakis.model_surgery.ModelSurgery(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Performs surgery on the model. Replaces, deletes, or permutes layers(in context).

delete_layers(indices)#

Deletes the specified layers(in context).

get_model()#
permute_layers(indices)#

Permutes the layers based on the given indices(in context).

replace_layers(indices, replacements)#

Replaces the specified layers with the given replacements(in context).

ReadWriteHeads#

class core_arrakis.read_write_heads.WriteReadAnalyzer(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Analyzes the read and write heads of the model.

identify_read_heads(layer_idx, dim_idx, threshold=0.8)#

Identifies the read heads of the layer. Returns the indices of the heads.

identify_write_heads(layer_idx, threshold=0.8)#

Identifies the write heads of the layer. Returns the indices of the heads.

trace_information_flow(input_ids, src_token, dst_token, n_layers=2)#

Traces the information flow from the source token to the destination token. Returns the flow at each layer.

ResidualDecomposer#

class core_arrakis.residual_decomposer.ResidualDecomposer(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Decomposes the residual stream into interpretable components from MLP and attention.

decompose_residual(input_ids, layer_idx, top_k=1)#

Decomposes the residual stream into interpretable components from MLP and attention.

mlp_basis(layer_idx)#

Computes the basis of the MLP layer.

ResidualTools#

class core_arrakis.residual_tools.ResidualTools(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

The residual stream in transformers carries information throughout the network.

feature_attribution(input_ids, target_ids)#

Attribute the final prediction back through the residual stream.

residual_decomposition(input_ids, layer_idx)#

Break down the residual stream to see where info comes from.

residual_movement(input_ids, layer_idx1, layer_idx2)#

Measure how much the residual stream changes between layers.

SparsityAnalyzer#

class core_arrakis.sparsity_analyzer.SparsityAnalyzer(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Analyzes the sparsity of the network.

compute_activation_sparsity(id_list, layer)#

Computes the sparsity of the activations of the layer.

find_polysemantic_neurons(threshold=1)#

Finds the polysemantic neurons in the network.

prune_network(sparsity_threshold=0.9)#

Prunes the network based on the sparsity threshold.

SuperpositionDisentangler#

class core_arrakis.superposition_disentangler.SuperpositionDisentangler(model)#

Bases: BaseInterpretabilityTool

Disentangles the superposition of the activations.

compute_activation_covariance(ids_list, layer)#

Computes the covariance matrix of the activations.

disentangle_superposition(cov_matrix, n_concepts=10)#

Disentangles the superposition of the activations.

interpolate_concepts(concept1, concept2, alpha)#

Interpolates between two concepts.

project_activations(activations, concepts)#

Projects the activations onto the concepts.

reconstruct_activations(projections, concepts)#

Reconstructs the activations from the projections.
